speaker: SIR TOBY BELCH
text_entry: SCENE III. A street.

speaker: SIR TOBY BELCH
text_entry: Enter SEBASTIAN and ANTONIO

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I would not by my will have troubled you;

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: But, since you make your pleasure of your pains,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I will no further chide you.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I could not stay behind you: my desire,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: More sharp than filed steel, did spur me forth;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: And not all love to see you, though so much

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: As might have drawn one to a longer voyage,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: But jealousy what might befall your travel,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Being skilless in these parts; which to a stranger,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Unguided and unfriended, often prove

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Rough and unhospitable: my willing love,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The rather by these arguments of fear,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Set forth in your pursuit.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: My kind Antonio,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I can no other answer make but thanks,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: And thanks; and ever [         ] oft good turns

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Are shuffled off with such uncurrent pay:

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: But, were my worth as is my conscience firm,

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: You should find better dealing. What's to do?

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Shall we go see the reliques of this town?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: To-morrow, sir: best first go see your lodging.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I am not weary, and 'tis long to night:

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I pray you, let us satisfy our eyes

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: With the memorials and the things of fame

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: That do renown this city.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Would you'ld pardon me;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I do not without danger walk these streets:

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Once, in a sea-fight, 'gainst the count his galleys

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I did some service; of such note indeed,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: That were I ta'en here it would scarce be answer'd.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Belike you slew great number of his people.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: The offence is not of such a bloody nature;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Albeit the quality of the time and quarrel

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Might well have given us bloody argument.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: It might have since been answer'd in repaying

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: What we took from them; which, for traffic's sake,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Most of our city did: only myself stood out;

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: For which, if I be lapsed in this place,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I shall pay dear.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Do not then walk too open.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: It doth not fit me. Hold, sir, here's my purse.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: In the south suburbs, at the Elephant,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Is best to lodge: I will bespeak our diet,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Whiles you beguile the time and feed your knowledge

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: With viewing of the town: there shall you have me.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Why I your purse?

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: Haply your eye shall light upon some toy

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: You have desire to purchase; and your store,

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: I think, is not for idle markets, sir.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I'll be your purse-bearer and leave you

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: For an hour.

speaker: ANTONIO
text_entry: To the Elephant.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: I do remember.

speaker: SEBASTIAN
text_entry: Exeunt
